sentence: "It comes down to focus on the district, producing results for the district, and in my opinion, Mr. Cawthorn hasn't demonstrated much in the way of results over the last 18 months," Tillis told CNN, describing why he is backing state Sen. Chuck Edwards in his primary against Cawthorn.
author: Melanie Zanona, Manu Raju and Alex Rogers
title: 'He's an embarrassment': Republicans threaten to primary Cawthorn over controversial antics

sentence: "It comes down to focus on the district, producing results for the district, and in my opinion, Mr. Cawthorn hasn't demonstrated much in the way of results over the last 18 months," Tillis told CNN, describing why he is backing state Sen. Chuck Edwards in his primary against Cawthorn.

title: 'He's an embarrassment': Republicans threaten to primary Cawthorn over controversial antics

sentence: After Cawthorn alleged that D.C. leaders used cocaine and invited him to an orgy, top Republicans started actively supporting one of his challengers, state Sen. Chuck Edwards.
title: The most interesting Republican primaries of 2022

sentence: Monday, Apr 25, 2022 1:52:47 PM Pacific Daylight Time Stephen Wolf NC-11: State Sen. sentence: The incumbent congressman is still supported by 38 percent of GOP voters, compared to 21 percent who back his top rival, state Senator Chuck Edwards.
author: Jason Lemon
title: Madison Cawthorn Losing GOP Support Despite Keeping Large Primary Lead

sentence: Cawthorn's two main opponents are state Sen. Chuck Edwards (R), considered the so-called establishment pick, and Michele Woodhouse, a former GOP district chair.
author: Tal Axelrod
title: Mounting scandals fuel uncertainty over Cawthorn's reelection
